Books

More Coming Soon

After several years of hard work, imagination and coffee - Danny has completed his first novel. The book will be available to pre-order until August 1st. Don't miss out and get yours today!

Mal Winter and the Cloud Runners

Now Available for Pre-order

After several years of hard work, imagination and coffee - Danny has completed his first novel. It's the first in a planned series of children's books that aims to take readers to another world. It's a lively coming-of-age tale that deals with a young boy's struggle to become a hero. The book will be available on the 1st of August.

  PRE-ORDER NOW

About the Site

Welcome to the home of new Australian writer Danny Beaton. Please take the time to look around and discover more about the writer and his available and future books.
